editor.label: Application Server - IIS DeleteWebSite
editor.description: This procedure deletes a web site.

formElement.label: Configuration name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the configuration that holds connection information for the IIS server. (Required)

formElement.label: Absolute path of the script utility:
formElement.documentation: Provide the absolute path of the script utility used to execute this step. If only 'iisweb' is entered, the 'iisweb' tool must be located on the system path 'c:/windows/system32'. i.e: 'iisweb' or 'c:/MyDir/IISFiles/iisweb.vbs'. (Required)

formElement.label: Web site name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the descriptive name, or the metabase path, of the web site you want to delete. (Required)
